name: Pirate Glider
description:
A simple but addictive game, the pirate captain drives glider fly toward the sky in the game, players can help the captain to avoid obstacles as much as possible, letting him fly farther.

Challenging difficulty! See how long you can hold, how far can fly~

Pirates struck, free to fly toward the sky.

The world's first choice for thousands of pirate animation fans

Exquisite picture, Simple operation

Move your finger easily, Come with partners refresh the record.
